page.title: 16GAMES CHILDREN PLAY
page.content:
Children play the games that interest them. Here are some of them:-
{ELASTICS-}You join elastic bands together to form an elastic chain. You jump over it when held at different heights. {MARBLES-}The aim of the game is to win round glass balls(marbles),by hitting the marble which is placed some distance away from you. {KERBY- }You play this with a ball against one opponent. Each person stands on a kerb opposite one another and tries to hit the kerb with the ball. {INDOOR GAMES}are chess,jigsaws, computer games,dominoes,cards and board games. Past generations have played most of these games with the exception of computer games.
